朣字的基本解释

朣
tóng
〔朣胧〕月初出；将明，如“月朣朣以含光兮”。

朣
chuáng
〔朣??〕尻骨。

朣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tóng］
［《集韻》徒東切，平東，定。］
亦作“膧1”。
见“朣朧”、“朣朦”。
[②]［chuáng］
亦作“膧2”。

朣字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【月字部】　朣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页506第31
【廣韻】【正韻】徒紅切【集韻】徒東切，?音同。月初出也。【潘岳·秋興賦】月朣朧以含光兮。【註】朣朧，欲明也。

朣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
朣字的起名意思

暂无。

朣
Basic explanation of words
朣
tóng
[朣朣朣] comes out at the beginning of the month; will be bright, such as "moon 朣朣 to contain light."
朣
chuang
〔朣??〕 尻骨.
朣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tóng］
["Jiyun" Tu Dongqie, Pingdong, Ding. ]
Also known as "膧1".
See "朣朣", "朣朣".
[②]［chuáng］
Also known as "膧2".
朣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Moon Character Department] 　朣; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 506 31
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Red Cut [Ji Yun] Dong cut with the same sound? Also in the beginning of the month. 【Pan Yue·Autumn Xing Fu】The moon is hazy with light. [Note] Hazy, I want to be clear.
